title: Discovery QRD-055: recursive_composition
hypothesis: Hypothesis: Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference) exhibits novel properties under recursive_composition transformation
core_mechanism: Core mechanism: A breakthrough practical cloud-native architecture with first-mover self-referential composition of Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference) enabling first-mover advantage through modular feedback loops through 2 interaction patterns

formulation.pseudocode:
function apply_recursive_composition(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference))
formulation.formal_spec: Formal: Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference) → A breakthrough practical cloud-native architecture with first-mover self-referential composition of Φ(TopologicalQubit) ⊗ Ψ(UltraLowBitInference) enabling first-mover advantage through modular feedback loops via recursive_composition

industrial_impact.application: Application of recursive_composition in production systems
